text: The 2005–06 Western Kentucky Hilltoppers men's basketball team represented Western Kentucky University during the 2005–06 NCAA Division I men's basketball season. The Hilltoppers were led by head coach Darrin Horn and Sun Belt Conference Player of the Year Anthony Winchester. The team won the East Division Championship and finished 2nd in the Sun Belt Basketball Tournament.SBC 2016-17 Basketball Media Guide, retrieved 28 April 2020 They participated in the National Invitation Tournament where they were defeated by eventual champion, South Carolina. Winchester and future NBA player Courtney Lee were named to the All SBC team. Elgrace Wilborn and Winchester made the SBC All-Tournament team.WKU Basketball Media Guide retrieved 21 April 2020 ==Schedule== 2005-06 Western Kentucky Hilltoppers Schedule and Results, Sports Reference, retrieved 29 April 2020 |- !colspan=6| Regular Season |- |- !colspan=6| 2006 Sun Belt Conference Men's Basketball Tournament |- !colspan=6| 2006 National Invitation Tournament ==References== Western Kentucky Category:Western Kentucky Hilltoppers basketball seasons Western Kentucky Western Kentucky Basketball, Men's Western Kentucky Basketball, Men's
